text:
Some things were not as robust as our current distribution solution. Also other
sectors of IT wanted in on the decision. Vulnerability scanning was one of the
key factors for CyberSec. Comparing Tanium and Teneble became their sticking
point. Restricting rbac was also a key factor since desktop guys should have no
control over Server OSs. Then when the time came to pitch the whole thing to the
C suite, they had additional requirements which prompted an entirely new POC
before getting a sign off. More deploy today :-)

metadata.subject: Re: [patchmanagement] If not Ivanti, what?
metadata.email_text_original:
You don't often get email from jeiversen@gmail.com. Learn why this is important
[https://aka.ms/LearnAboutSenderIdentification]
